item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Spice86 – A PC emulator for real mode reverse engineering (21 points | discuss)
2. Helix: A Vision-Language-Action Model for Generalist Humanoid Control (73 points | 32 comments)
3. After 20 Years, Math Couple Solves Major Group Theory Problem (208 points | 38 comments)

6. 1972 Unix V2 "Beta" Resurrected (361 points | 85 comments)

8. FAQ on Microsoft's topological qubit thing (217 points | 36 comments)
9. Softmax forever, or why I like softmax (135 points | 50 comments)
10. Show HN: Subtrace – Wireshark for Docker Containers (325 points | 64 comments)
11. All-optical control of charge-trapping defects in rare-earth doped oxides (21 points | 1 comment)
12. Show HN: Mastra – Open-source JS agent framework, by the developers of Gatsby (408 points | 140 comments)
13. Egg prices are soaring. Are backyard chickens the answer? (189 points | 531 comments)
14. Agent-Less System Monitoring with Elixir Broadway (56 points | 13 comments)
15. The 8-Bit Era's Weird Uncle: The TI-99/4A (136 points | 77 comments)

18. The Amazon Appstore for Android devices will be discontinued on August 20, 2025 (148 points | 112 comments)

20. F8 – an 8 bit architecture designed for C and memory efficiency [video] (53 points | 16 comments)
21. The Forecasting Company (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
22. AI killed the tech interview. Now what? (102 points | 222 comments)
23. Speed matters (2021) (51 points | 24 comments)

25. Relaxed Radix Balanced Trees (2024) (169 points | 14 comments)

27. Broken legs and ankles heal better if you walk on them within weeks (530 points | 293 comments)
28. Scented products cause indoor air pollution on par with car exhaust (322 points | 144 comments)
29. Multiple Russia-aligned threat actors actively targeting Signal Messenger (776 points | 271 comments)
